alert.note: Alert for Knox; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 3:03PM EDT until August 09 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in south central Kentucky, Whitley. In southeast Kentucky, Knox. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow-moving thunderstorms. Excessive rainfall will cause minor flooding of small streams and creeks, roads, and roadside culverts. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Barbourville, Permon, Indian Creek, Clate, Wilton, Dishman Springs, Perkins, King, Swan Lake, Rockholds, Emmanuel, Bryants Store, Swanpond, Faber, Suttons Mill, Heidrick, Corbin and Providence.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
